attributes.action: allow MPs to sit in Westminster without swearing allegiance to the Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To sit in Westminster as a democratically elected MP you must swear allegiance to the Queen. Your only allegiance ought to be to the people who you represent. There is no point in a debate if everyone has the same beliefs and opinions - that is a false democracy.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
